exceptions.exn: In environment K : AbsRing V : NormedModule K x : V P : V -> Prop eps : posreal Heps : forall y : V, ball (opp x) eps y -> P y y : V Hy : ball x eps y Unable to unify "ball x eps y" with "ball (AbelianGroup.opp V (AbelianGroup.class V) x) eps (AbelianGroup.opp V (AbelianGroup.class V) y)".

original: intros x. unfold filterlim, locally. intros P [eps Heps]. exists eps. intros y Hy. apply Heps. unfold opp. apply Hy.
